items.q: Do I need a doctor's referral?
items.a: Not in most cases. Many insurance plans allow direct access to physical therapy. Call us to verify.
Most major plans including Blue Cross, Aetna, UnitedHealthcare, Cigna, and Medicare.
Initial evaluations are 60 minutes. Follow-up sessions are 45 minutes, one-on-one with your therapist.
Yes. Both locations offer appointments until 7pm Monday through Thursday.
